plays.text: Penalty to Steve McKenna 2 minutes for Interference Jeff Cowan
Penalty to Shawn McEachern 2 minutes for Tripping Dick Tarnstrom
Goal scored by Jan Hrdina assisted by Mario Lemieux and Aleksey Morozov
Penalty to Dan LaCouture 5 minutes for Fighting Andy Sutton
Penalty to Andy Sutton 5 minutes for Fighting Dan LaCouture
Penalty to Kent Manderville 2 minutes for Holding Dany Heatley
Penalty to Jeff Cowan 2 minutes for Interference Ian Moran
Penalty to Dick Tarnstrom 2 minutes for Hooking Shawn McEachern
Goal scored by Ilya Kovalchuk assisted by Slava Kozlov and Yannick Tremblay
Penalty to Chris Tamer 2 minutes for Crosschecking Ville Nieminen
Penalty to Andy Sutton 2 minutes for Boarding Aleksey Morozov
Goal scored by Alexei Kovalev assisted by Dick Tarnstrom and Mario Lemieux
Goal scored by Wayne Primeau unassisted
